overview:
Rich Montbleau is one of the Co-Founders and the Executive Vice President of Bridge Energy Group.

Mr. Montbleau has responsibilities for West Coast Sales & Marketing and Solutions Delivery. In this role, Mr. Montbleau delivers consistent client relationship management and customer satisfaction through a unified sales and service delivery team. During his 16 year career in sales & marketing in Energy & Utilities, Financial Services, and Telecommunications, Mr. Montbleau has developed a powerful combination of factors that have paved the way for BRIDGEâ€™s success. Prior to founding BRIDGE, Richard served as the Director of Sales & Relationship Management for Edgewater Technologies, and has served in other key sales and marketing positions at Alliance Consulting and Darwin Partners, two Inc 500 ranked Information Technology Solutions Companies.

Mr. Montbleau holds a Bachelors Degree in Business Administration from Salem State University School of Business.
